articles.author: Mike Blanchfield
articles.title: Carney says Canada will meet NATO spending target this year - Politico
articles.description: The Canadian prime minister framed the spending as a necessary response to a world where the country is more vulnerable to threats — and less protected by Americans.
articles.content:
Carney framed the new spending as a necessary response to a more dangerous world that has left Canada more vulnerable to threats in the Arctic and less protected by Americans.
A new imperialism thre… [+3209 chars]
